description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. XBLIGs first shooter with full TATE support!  Vertical manic shooter based on various arcade classics. Various modes of play. Challenging risk/reward scoring system. Online networked scores for competitive play. Unleash the power of super mode for maximum scoring in single ranked games, or co-op with a friend using one of 4 ships up against enemies guaranteed to crush you with fearsome fire power!
